title: Update the selected catalog price to AED 4

requirements.text: Update only the catalog item price that renders in the selected element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1]` so that it displays as AED 4 (i.e., the backend `price` value for that specific item must be `4`).
acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to the same category and item in the UI, the price text content at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1]` shows AED 4.00 (as formatted by the existing formatter) and no other item prices change.
The change is implemented by updating the corresponding item `price : Nat` value in `backend/main.mo` so the UI reflects the updated value through normal data flow (no hardcoded UI overrides).

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the single UI element identified by the provided XPath by updating the corresponding single catalog item price (do not change global price formatting).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`.
Do not edit any frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the global price formatting function (e.g., do not remove the trailing .00) unless explicitly requested.
Do not update unrelated catalog item names, category names, or other prices.
